"al-ḥamd lillāh wa-salām ʻal áʻbādihi alladhīna iṣṭafá ... ammā baʻd fa-innaka asharta ilaynā bi-sharḥ al-alfāẓ allatī tadāwalathā al-ṣūfīyah al-muḥaqqiqūn... al-hājis ... al-tajallī.
MS Arab 225. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
